topic.title: Control Templates
topic.p: Control Templates offer customization of control appearances.

Here are all predefined control templates and their control themes:
<ControlTemplate/>: CustomControl, GroupBox, MenuBar, MenuSplitter, ToolstripToolBar, ToolstripSplitter, RibbonSplitter, RibbonToolstripHeader
<LabelTemplate/>: Label, ShortcutKey
<SinglelineTextBoxTemplate/>: SinglelineTextBox
<DocumentLabelTemplate/>: DocumentLabel, DocumentTextBox
<WindowTemplate/>: Window, Tooltip
<MenuTemplate/>: Menu
<RibbonToolstripMenuTemplate/>: RibbonToolstripMenu
<ButtonTemplate/>: Button
<SelectableButtonTemplate/>: CheckBox, RadioButton, ListItemBackground, TreeItemExpander, CheckTextListItem, RadioTextListItem
<ToolstripButtonTemplate/>: MenuBarButton, MenuItemButton, ToolstripButton, ToolstripDropdownButton, ToolstripSplitButton, RibbonSmallButton, RibbonSmallDropdownButton, RibbonSmallSplitButton, RibbonLargeButton, RibbonLargeDropdownButton, RibbonSplitButton
<ListViewColumnHeaderTemplate/>
<ComboBoxTemplate/>: ComboBox
<DateComboBoxTemplate/>: DateComboBox
<ScrollTemplate/>: ProgressBar, HScroll, VScroll, HTracker, VTracker
<ScrollViewTemplate/>: ScrollView
<MultilineTextBoxTemplate/>: MultilineTextBox
<DocumentViewerTemplate/>: DocumentViewer
<ListControlTemplate/>
<TextListTemplate/>: TextList, RibbonGalleryItemList
<ListViewTemplate/>: ListView
<TreeViewTemplate/>: TreeView
<TabTemplate/>: Tab
<RibbonGroupTemplate/>: RibbonGroup
<DatePickerTemplate/>: DatePicker
<RibbonGroupTemplate/>: RibbonGroup
<RibbonIconLabelTemplate/>: RibbonIconLabel, RibbonSmallIconLabel
<RibbonButtonsTemplate/>: RibbonButtons
<RibbonToolstripsTemplate/>: RibbonToolstrips
<RibbonGalleryTemplate/>: RibbonGallery
<RibbonGalleryListTemplate/>: RibbonGalleryList
